unnormalised: Okay, so transfer season in the Indian Super League (ISL) is like Diwali for football fans, except instead of fireworks, we get explosive rumors and player announcements. It's that time of the year when clubs are busy doing *jugaad* to build the best possible squad, and fans are glued to their phones, refreshing Twitter for the latest update. It's all about speculation, linking every promising player from I-League with every deep-pocketed ISL team.
